English Translation: a sound of doubt or surprise, “Oh?”

xlitHelp: (Try to read Numbers 2 and 7 together: bā / bà)

English Translation: to cook on a slow fire

xlitHelp: (Try to read Numbers 9 and 11 together: bāo / páo)
(Try to read Numbers 7 and 14 together: bà / bá)

Language: péi pei bà ba mā ma.
bā ba mā ma ài nǐ.

English Translation: older sister is taking care of little (younger) brother

Language: jiě jie qiē le dàn gāo.
English Translation: My older sister cut the cake.

Language: bǎ biàn zi zā qǐ lái

English Translation: The little cat is very cute.

Language: xiǎo dì di zhǎng gāo le.
English Translation: The little boy grew very tall.

Language: nán hái xǐ huān wǔ shù.
sūn wù kōng shì dà wáng.
English Translation: The Monkey King is the king.

Language: nǐ dǎ suàn zěn me zuò?
English Translation: What do you plan to do?
The little cat is fun to play with.

Language: nǐ de wén zhāng xiě de hǎo.
wǒ ài wǒ de zǔ guó.

xlitHelp: (Read Numbers 2 and 10 together: wēi lì / wèi le)

Language: zhè tiáo sī jīn tài guì le!
English Translation: This silk scarf is too expensive!

Language: xiàn zài wǒ men kāi huì.
English Translation: We will start the meeting now.

Language: wǒ xǐ huān chī píng guǒ.
sī jīn shì sī chóu zuò de.
English Translation: Silk scarves are made from silk cloth.

Language: dà jiā dōu lái le ma?
huáng hé de shǔi hěn huáng.
English Translation: The water in the Yellow River is very yellow.

Language: tā jué dìng qù běi jīng.
English Translation: She decided to go to Beijing.

Language: yī fu shàng yìn le huā
xiàn shàng yì duǒ méi guì huā
chūn tiān yòu kāi huā le.
tā hé péng yǒu yì qǐ yóu yǒng.
jīn wǎn yuè liang zhēn yuán.
English Translation: The moon is very round tonight.
Would you be willing to go?

Language: dà yàn fēi huí běi fāng.
English Translation: Wild geese fly back to the north.

Language: cóng shàng hǎi dào guǎng zhōu
cóng měi guó dào zhōng guó
wǒ hěn xǐ huān nǐu yuē.
nǐ chī zǎo cān le ma?

English Translation: What are we eating for dinner?

Language: wǎn cān yǒu yú hé shū cài.
English Translation: We have fish and vegetables for dinner.
Would you like something to drink?

Language: nǎ jiā cān guǎn hǎo chī?

English Translation: a restaurant that makes roast duck

Language: quán jù dé kǎo yā diàn
měi guó de dà chéng shì
yǒu xǔ duō zhōng cān guǎn.
wǒ yé xǐ huān xī cān.
nǐ xiǎng yào shén me yǐn liào?
English Translation: What would you like to drink?

Language: wǒ xiǎng yào yì bēi chá.
English Translation: I would like to order a cup of tea.

Language: nǐ xiǎng diǎn shén me cài?
English Translation: What do you want to order?

Language: wǒ yào yì zhī kǎo yā.
English Translation: I want to eat roast duck.
